2007-06-04

You like the shoes I wear #10 - Mark Linkous (Sparklehorse)


Mark Linkous of Sparklehorse
(originally uploaded by DG Jones)

I'm annoyed that I managed to forget my camera last night and never got my own pic of Mark's feet so I was relieved to find that someone else was kind enough to snap this shot at a previous Shepherds Bush show (Oh how I'd have loved to see him at the Bush Hall). I suspect these are the very same comfortable looking boots he wore last night...



#10 Mark Linkous and his well worn DMs.
